name: Hall of Ween
description:
Hall of Ween is a rogue-lite bullet-hell action game about finding the perfect Halloween costume! 

Some costumes are spooky! Some are gross! Some are sexy! Mix and match over 100 different costume components to create your playstyle, and survive the Hall of Ween!

Made in one week for the 2020 Spooktober Jam

Credits:

Art, Design, Programming, Writing: Ethan Goldreyer

Sounds: Courtesy of soundbible.com

All music is royalty free
